      • getContentSerializer

        public JsonSerializer<?> getContentSerializer()
        从类复制的说明: ContainerSerializer
        Accessor for serializer used for serializing contents (List and array elements, Map values etc) of the container for which this serializer is used, if it is known statically. Note that for dynamic types this may return null; if so, caller has to instead use ContainerSerializer.getContentType() and SerializerProvider.findValueSerializer(java.lang.Class<?>, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.BeanProperty).
        指定者:
        getContentSerializer 在类中 ContainerSerializer<float[]>

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty(SerializerProvider prov,
                       float[] value)
        从类复制的说明: JsonSerializer
        Method called to check whether given serializable value is considered "empty" value (for purposes of suppressing serialization of empty values).

        Default implementation will consider only null values to be empty.

        NOTE: replaces JsonSerializer.isEmpty(Object), which was deprecated in 2.5

        覆盖:
        isEmpty 在类中 JsonSerializer<float[]>

      • hasSingleElement

        public boolean hasSingleElement(float[] value)
        从类复制的说明: ContainerSerializer
        Method called to determine if the given value (of type handled by this serializer) contains exactly one element.

        Note: although it might seem sensible to instead define something like "getElementCount()" method, this would not work well for containers that do not keep track of size (like linked lists may not).

        Note, too, that as of now (2.9) this method is only called by serializer itself; and specifically is not used for non-array/collection types like Map or Map.Entry instances.

        指定者:
        hasSingleElement 在类中 ContainerSerializer<float[]>

      • serialize

        public final void serialize(float[] value,
                            JsonGenerator g,
                            SerializerProvider provider)
                     throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: JsonSerializer
        Method that can be called to ask implementation to serialize values of type this serializer handles.
        覆盖:
        serialize 在类中 ArraySerializerBase<float[]>
        参数:
        value - Value to serialize; can not be null.
        g - Generator used to output resulting Json content
        provider - Provider that can be used to get serializers for serializing Objects value contains, if any.
        抛出:
        IOException

        从类复制的说明: StdSerializer
